articles.title: Spokesman for FM of DPRK Categorically Rejects Anti-DPRK "Human Rights Resolution"
articles.content:
Spokesman for FM of DPRK Categorically Rejects Anti-DPRK "Human Rights Resolution" 
 Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK released a statement Saturday lashing out at the U.S. and its allies including Japan and EU for railroading the anti-DPRK "human rights resolution" through the 28th session of the UN Human Rights Council.
					 The U.S. and its allies, Japan and EU, and other forces rammed the anti-DPRK "human rights resolution" through the 28th session of the UN Human Rights Council held on Friday despite the unanimous opposition of the world progressive countries aspiring after guarantee of genuine human rights and establishment of a fair world order, the statement said, adding:
					
					 The DPRK vehemently denounces the farce staged at the UN human rights arena as a product of the U.S. hostile policy toward the former and clarifies once again its firm will to thoroughly smash the noisy "human rights" racket kicked off by the hostile forces.
					
					 The adoption of the "resolution" once again brought to light the ulterior design of the U.S. and other hostile forces to hurt the dignity of the DPRK and tarnish its image by making much fuss about its groundless "human rights issue" and to invent a pretext for perpetrating intervention and aggression against it at any cost.
					
					 It has already been fully exposed to the world that the "human rights issue" of the DPRK which had been cooked up by the lackeys of the U.S. wearing the mask of "protecting human rights" and noisily advertised by the U.S. and other western countries on the basis of the "testimonies" made by "defectors from the north", human scum bereft of elementary quality and conscience as human beings, was no more than a fabrication.
					
					 However, the U.S. and its allies staged another farce of adopting "human rights resolution" against the DPRK, repeating their worn-out assertion. This is aimed to get rid of the dilemma in which they are finding themselves by going desperate in their anti-DPRK "human rights" racket and divert elsewhere the world-wide criticism of the human rights abuses perpetrated by them.
					
					 The U.S. is saying this or that about human rights performance in other countries while neither setting right nor admitting hideous human rights abuses in its country. This is the height of impudence.
					
					 Washington should not poke its nose into the internal affairs of other countries, styling itself the world's "human rights judge," but improve the human rights situation in its own land, the world's worst human rights tundra. Japan and the EU should stop blindly toeing the U.S. line but improve their marred images before the world's eyes. 
					
					 The U.S. should clearly understand that it is a pipedream to try to bring down the most advantageous socialist system in the DPRK which its army and people regard dearer than their own lives.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries' Crackdown upon Chongryon Accused
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries' Crackdown upon Chongryon Accused
 Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- The Japanese police authorities on March 26 conducted a surprise search operation against the houses of the officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) including the chairman and vice-chairman of its Central Standing Committee by hurling the joint investigation headquarters made up of various police headquarters of Kyoto Prefecture, Kanagawa Prefecture, Yamaguchi Prefecture and Shimane Prefecture.
					 They completely blocked off the house of the chairman, in particular, and searched it, by mobilizing more than twenty policemen and an armored car and bringing media persons of Japan to the scene, creating a terror-ridden atmosphere.
					
					 The Committee for Aiding Overseas Compatriots of Korea Friday issued a statement in which it vehemently denounced the Japanese reactionaries' brutal crackdown upon Chongryon.
					
					 The statement said:
					
					 The forcible search was an unprecedented illegal one contradictory to the Japan constitution and criminal procedure law and an unpardonable human rights abuse against the Koreans in Japan and national discrimination.
					
					 Even legal experts and fair-minded media persons of Japan are skeptical about the legal validity and political purpose of the search operation and censuring its injustice.
					
					  Chongryon is a dignified overseas organization of the DPRK and the infringement upon it and Koreans in Japan is, therefore, the one on the sovereignty of the DPRK.
					
					 Quite clear is the political aim sought by the Japanese authorities in the fascist action taken by them with police forces involved.
					
					 That is the sinister political trick to fan up the sentiment against the DPRK, Chongryon and Koreans in the Japanese society in a bid to quell the call of progressives for Japan's apology and reparation for its imperialists' past colonization and justify its lurch to the right.
					
					 It is a product of its political plot to extend again its unilateral "sanctions" against the DPRK by all means and methods and deliberately stem the trend of the times for improving the DPRK-Japan relations.
					
					 The Japanese authorities should make apology to Chongryon and the DPRK for their rash and reckless search and behave themselves, clearly mindful that their persecution and crackdown upon Chongryon are self-destruction as they push the DPRK-Japan relations to rock bottom.

articles.title: DPRK-Japan Friendship Association Accuses Japanese Reactionaries' Crackdown upon Chongryon
articles.content:
DPRK-Japan Friendship Association Accuses Japanese Reactionaries' Crackdown upon Chongryon
 Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- The Japanese joint police investigation headquarters conducted a surprise search operation against the houses of the officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) including the chairman and vice-chairman of its Central Standing Committee on March 26. The headquarters includes police of Kyoto Prefecture, Kanagawa Prefecture, Yamaguchi Prefecture and Shimane Prefecture.
					 The Japanese investigation authorities alleged "Chongryon was likely to have violated the foreign exchange law" when conducted the forcible search only to end up with no positive material evidence.
					
					 The DPRK-Japan Friendship Association Saturday in a statement denounced the search as illegal investigation in breach of international law, to say nothing of Japan Constitution and criminal procedure law. The statement said:
					
					 So far, the Japanese reactionaries have committed unwarranted crackdown upon Chongryon and Koreans in Japan against law. But it is the first time that they targeted the chairman and vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon, who are deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK.
					
					 The recent serious case in Japan, which styles itself a "law-governed state" and "democratic state", is an unpardonable provocation and serious infringement on sovereignty of the DPRK.
					
					 It was carried out by the order of Japan Police Agency and with a search-warrant issued by the judicial authorities. These facts prove that the Japanese government authorities are entirely responsible for the unreasonable search.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are now making desperate efforts to create a springboard for accelerating their moves to make Japan lurch to the right and fascist and realizing their ambition for emerging a military giant while taking the advantage of the U.S. frantic anti-DPRK moves.
					
					 The Korean nation will never pardon the Japanese reactionary forces' desperate suppression of Chongryon aimed at pushing the DPRK-Japan relations to a catastrophe once again. 
					
					 If the Japanese authorities sincerely want the improved DPRK-Japan relations, they should stop at once the crackdown upon Chongryon and Koreans in Japan.

articles.title: Korea-Japan Society for Interchange Censures Suppression of Chongryon
articles.content:
Korea-Japan Society for Interchange Censures Suppression of Chongryon
 Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- The Korea-Japan Society for Interchange in a statement Saturday hit out at the Japan Police Agency's search of the houses of the chairman and vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) who are deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK on Mar. 26.
					 The unwarranted anti-DPRK and anti-Chongryon act that activated tens of police and armored cars is touching off strong protest and denunciation and towering resentment. The statement said:
					
					 The despicable act that is timed to coincide with the U.S. vicious anti-DPRK "human rights" campaign is apparently pursuant to the U.S. scenario. The U.S. tries to strangle the DPRK with severe "sanctions", talking about "collapse of its social system".
					
					 Japan which styles itself a "law-governed state" committed the bullying act, intentionally charging Chongryon with suspicious involvement in a case without legal and scientific validity, not content with working as a shock brigade in carrying out the U.S. anti-DPRK "human rights" campaign. This can never go unnoticed.
					
					 Chongryon is a legitimate overseas citizens' organization of the DPRK advocating all democratic and national rights of the Koreans in Japan, and it plays the role of the DPRK mission abroad as the two countries have no diplomatic relations.
					
					 The Society strongly denounces the suppression of the leading officials of Chongryon as a serious human rights abuse and an intolerable infringement on the sovereignty of the DPRK.
					
					 Japan has not made any proper redemption for its past crimes against humanity, 70 years since its defeat in the war. It is greatly mistaken if it thinks it can go scot-free after suppressing Koreans in Japan.
					
					 The Japanese authorities have to apologize for the fascist act and punish those responsible.
					
					 If this incident has adverse impacts on the implementation of the DPRK-Japan Pyongyang Declaration and the Stockholm agreement, Japan will have to hold full responsibility.

articles.title: Secretariat of CPRK Denounces S. Korean Authorities' Anti-DPRK Racket
articles.content:
Secretariat of CPRK Denounces S. Korean Authorities' Anti-DPRK Racket 
 Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) Friday released information bulletin No. 1087 denouncing the south Korean puppet authorities for their frantic anti-DPRK campaign, five years since the Cheonan warship sinking case. 
					 The south Korean authorities staged large-scale "memorial service," "meeting for ensuring security" and "special photo exhibition for security" almost every day to claim that Cheonan was "sunken by the attack of the north's submarine" and cry out for "apology" and "punishment." 
					
					 Meanwhile, south Korean military warmongers staged naval maneuvers with many warships and a live-shell firing drill as part of the Foal Eagle war exercises now under way with U.S. forces, fanning up war atmosphere. 
					
					 What matters is that even the chief executive took part in this farce to let loose a litany of invectives against the DPRK. 
					
					 In her "memorial address" at the "memorial service" held at Taejon Hyonchung Cemetery on Thursday she malignantly pulled up the north, blustering that it should stop its "reckless provocations" and drop "the idea that nukes can protect it" and talking about "isolation" and "genuine change," not content with vociferating about the "north's surprise torpedo attack" and the like. 
					
					 Kim Mu Song, representative of the "Saenuri Party," Friday dared let loose a whole string of outbursts hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK. 
					
					 This was an extremely reckless act of driving the inter-Korean relations into an uncontrollable catastrophe as it was another intolerable grave provocation to the DPRK. 
					
					 Now everybody with reason and elementary ability to judge things does not believe in the false propaganda that "Cheonan was sunken by the north's torpedo attack."  The louder trumpeting of the U.S. and south Korean authorities about it only invite bitterer derision of the international community.
					
					 Nevertheless, the south Korean puppet authorities shamelessly visited cemetery of those puppet army soldiers who fell victim to the U.S. moves for a war against the DPRK to express consolation and the like and let loose a flurry of invectives against it. This is the height of shamelessness. 
					
					 The confrontation racket the criminals and murderers, who sank the warship Cheonan, kicked up by deliberately linking the case with the north is nothing but a charade orchestrated out of guilty conscience. 
					
					 Truth can never be concealed and the arch criminals who cooked up the Cheonan warship sinking case can never escape a severe punishment by history and the nation. 
					
					 The conservative group including the chief executive of south Korea should make an apology to the entire nation for hurting the DPRK and stop at once hatching provocative plots. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities should behave themselves, thinking twice about the catastrophic consequences to be entailed by their reckless acts.

articles.title: DWUK Delegation Leaves for El Salvador, Mexico
articles.content:
DWUK Delegation Leaves for El Salvador, Mexico
 Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea led by Chae Chun Hui, vice-chairwoman of its Central Committee, left here by air on Saturday to participate in the meetings of the Women's International Democratic Federation to be held in El Salvador and to visit Mexico.

articles.title: Delegation of Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League Leaves for Lebanon, Syria
articles.content:
Delegation of Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League Leaves for Lebanon, Syria
 Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League led by Jong Yong Won, vice-chairman of its Central Committee, left here Saturday to take part in the meeting of the General Council of the World Federation of Democratic Youth to be held in Lebanon and the 9th Congress of the Revolutionary Youth Union of Syria to be held in Syria.

articles.title: U.S. Harsh Sanctions against DPRK Will Entail Catastrophic Consequences: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Harsh Sanctions against DPRK Will Entail Catastrophic Consequences: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- Early in January this year Obama issued a "presidential executive order" to impose additional sanctions upon the DPRK over the cyber attack on the Sony Pictures Entertainment. The International Relations Committee of the U.S. House of Representatives adopted a bill on ratcheting up sanctions against the DPRK in February. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a commentator's article notes in this regard:
					
					 The U.S. administration and Congress are vying with each other in slapping sanctions against the DPRK. This is something rare to be seen in the past.
					
					 Washington's one-sided policy for ratcheting up the sanctions against the DPRK is no more than the last resort chosen by it from the calculation that it can neither check the latter's bolstering of nuclear deterrent nor disturb its economic growth through power-backed pressure only. It is also a last-ditch effort to block the DPRK's successful advance by slapping harsher sanctions against it.
					
					 From the outset of this year, the U.S. has got frantic with its moves to pressurize the DPRK by force and sanctions in a bid to lead it to "earlier changes."
					
					 The sinister design of the U.S., an empire of devils, to wipe the DPRK, a sovereign state, off the world map by igniting even a nuclear war on the Korean peninsula is being revealed with each passing day.
					
					  Washington set it a policy and a law to ratchet up its sanctions and pressure upon the DPRK. It is working with bloodshot eyes to establish an international cooperation system for enforcing them while floating a story about "nuclear threat" from the latter.
					
					 Under the prevailing situation where the U.S. is recklessly pursuing the above-said policy after throwing away even the double-dealing policy of dialogue and pressure it much touted in the past, the DPRK clarifies once again its unshakable stand reflecting the towering resentment of its service personnel and people at the U.S. and their confidence in sure victory as follows:
					
					 Firstly, the above-said U.S. policy precisely means a declaration of war against the DPRK and it is the latter's resolute determination to conclude its decades-old showdown with the former with nukes.
					
					 Secondly, the U.S. foolish acts of tightening collusion and nexus with other countries, pulling up the DPRK over its "nuclear issue", will only bring earlier the latter's great war for national reunification.
					
					 Thirdly, the further the U.S. ratchets up sanctions to pressurize the DPRK, the higher the latter will hold the banner of the line of simultaneously developing the two fronts to hasten its final victory.
					
					 If the U.S. persists in its policy for ratcheting up sanctions and pressure upon the DPRK, it will be bound to face an unimaginable catastrophe. This is a solemn warning served by the DPRK.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Dealing Sledge Hammer Blows at Pro-U.S. Lackeys of S. Korea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Dealing Sledge Hammer Blows at Pro-U.S. Lackeys of S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an article deals with ridiculous burlesques being staged in south Korea since the recent knife attack on the U.S. ambassador.
					 The puppet chief executive, who has never shown any concern over the death of south Koreans, kowtowed to the U.S. ambassador and made an apology for it. Her yes men are running the whole gamut of flattery to the U.S., fasting in expression of remorse for having failed to protect their master and calling on him with things of sympathy and doctor's fee.
					
					 These are silly acts perpetrated by those betes noires who have abandoned even elementary self-respect as human beings, to say nothing of national dignity. These acts of treachery can be committed only by top class stooges groomed as running dogs of the U.S., the article says, adding:
					
					 There is "government" in south Korea, but this is little short of fig-leaf and marionette to cover up the U.S. imperialists' colonial rule.
					
					 South Korea is a complete U.S. colony as its regime has no real power and its army lacks prerogative of supreme command and there is nothing Korean in its economy and culture.
					
					 It is universally recognized that anyone who wants to come to power in south Korea should be recognized by the U.S.
					
					 There are too many examples to cite as regards the shameful sycophancy and treacherous acts of the successive puppet ruling forces. 
					
					 Forgetful of south Korea being "51st state" of the U.S., its puppet forces are talking about "state status" and "advanced country." This only invites derision of public at home and abroad.
					
					 The U.S. colonial domination and subjugation of south Korea can never be terminated and the danger of a war be defused on the Korean peninsula and the Korean nation's desire for the reunification be achieved as long as sycophants and traitors without equals remain in power, kowtowing to the U.S. which has inflicted pain of division upon the Koreans for seven decades.
					
					The only way is to deal sledge hammer blows at the puppet group.

articles.title: U.S. and S. Korean Warmongers Starts Large-scale Landing Drill
articles.content:
U.S. and S. Korean Warmongers Starts Large-scale Landing Drill
 Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialist aggression troops and south Korean warmongers Friday kicked off large-scale joint naval maneuver aiming at landing in coastal areas of the DPRK, according to south Korean Yonhap News. 
					 Involved in the drill are more than 7 600 troops of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces and south Korean marines and seamen, over  30 warships including landing ships, transport crafts, Aegis destroyers and submarines, more than 80 aircrafts and over 40 landing armored vehicles. 
					
					 This saber-rattling which will last till April 1 will include such offensive rehearsal as naval maneuver, naval infiltration and coastal reconnaissance drills for clearing in advance obstacles to landing, large-scale naval bombardment and air strike drills for wiping out forces in the targeted areas. 
					
					 They are mulling conducting drills for landing, naval search and rescue and emergency airborne supply in the area of Phohang of North Kyongsang Province on March 30 in the wake of landing rehearsal, the phase of "decisive action". 
					
					 The landing drill which they openly claimed is aimed to "occupy Pyongyang" brings to light the aggressive nature of the joint military drills which they are describing as "annual and defensive ones."

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Calls for General Strike
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Calls for General Strike
 Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- The Pusan Headquarters of the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions (KCTU) held a rally at the plaza of Pusan Railway Station on March 25 at which it called for joining in the April 24 general strike.
					 Speakers at the rally recalled that the KCTU released a written demand raised to the "government" for guaranteeing the right of the workers to exist and declared the April 24 general strike.
					
					 They accused the Park Geun Hye regime of working hard to turn work sites into those of part timers under an unreasonable pretext and stamp out the labor movement.
					
					 Members of civic and social organizations in Pusan declared at the rally that they would join in the KCTU's general strike to put an end to the anti-worker, unpopular and undemocratic policy of the Park regime.
					
					 At the end of the rally the participants staged a demonstration.

articles.title: S. Korean Disabled Persons Declare Actions for Right to Existence
articles.content:
S. Korean Disabled Persons Declare Actions for Right to Existence
 Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- The April 20  joint struggle group for abolishing discrimination against disabled persons held a meeting in connection with its formation in Seoul on Mar. 26.
					 At the meeting speakers denounced the authorities for paying lip-service to "protection" and "sympathy" after designating April 20 every year as "day of persons with disabilities."
					
					 They said that the "day of persons with disabilities" is to cover up the discrimination and exclusion of disabled persons on this land.
					
					 They called for turning out in actions for the right to existence in order to build a society where the disabled persons are guaranteed the right to live in peace.
					
					 They declared that they would make April 20 the day for abolishing the discrimination against the disabled persons.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Regime Blasted for Hindering Activities to Probe Truth about Ferry Sewol Disaster
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Regime Blasted for Hindering Activities to Probe Truth about Ferry Sewol Disaster
 Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Voice of People on Mar. 25 in an editorial condemned the puppet regime for blocking the activities to probe the truth behind the ferry Sewol disaster.
					 The editorial said:
					
					 It was disclosed that a civil servant, a member of the Special Committee for Investigating the Ferry Sewol Disaster, sent Chongwadae and the "Saenuri Party" information about its work.
					
					 It is absolutely intolerable that they planted their spy in the committee.
					
					 The editorial called for punishing the do-nothing forces only keen on ensuring the safety of the regime and evading the responsibility for the ferry disaster.

articles.title: Chongryon Denounces Japanese Police's Suppression
articles.content:
Chongryon Denounces Japanese Police's Suppression 
 Tokyo, March 26 (KNS-KCNA) -- The Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) held a press conference at the Korean Hall in Tokyo on Mar. 26 in protest against the Japanese police authorities' intolerable search for the houses of Chongryon officials. 
					 At the press conference a statement of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee was read out. 
					
					 The statement referred to the fact that the Japanese police authorities in the morning of March 26 conducted an unreasonable surprise search operation against the houses of the officials of Chongryon including Chairman Ho Jong Man and Vice-Chairman Nam Sung U of its Central Standing Committee by hurling the joint investigation headquarters made up of police headquarters of Kyoto, Kanagawa, Yamaguchi and Shimane prefectures. 
					
					 The statement went on:
					
					 The search was conducted by them on absurd charge of the violation of "foreign exchange law" by a Korean resident's company which has nothing to do with Chongryon. 
					
					 Chongryon is not related to the case at all, it noted, and continued: 
					
					 The search is a despicable act of fanning up antagonism toward the DPRK and Chongryon in Japan by treating the chairman and vice-chairman of Chongryon as "criminals" though it is playing the role of a foreign diplomatic mission of the DPRK. 
					
					 One cannot but suspect the Japanese government over the unjust search operation against officials of Chongryon. 
					
					 The search will seriously affect the DPRK-Japan relations and the Japanese government will be held wholly responsible for it.

articles.title: Japanese Organization Denounces U.S.-S. Korean Joint Military Drills
articles.content:
Japanese Organization Denounces U.S.-S. Korean Joint Military Drills
 Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- The Nagano Prefectural People's Council for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea in a statement on Mar. 17 denounced the U.S.-south Korea joint military drills.
					 The statement said:
					
					 This year marking the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation is a golden opportunity to promote the political dialogue among the countries concerned for the purpose of achieving peace and stability in Northeast Asia, strengthening the relations of confidence among various countries and putting an end to the tragic division of the Korean nation.
					
					 This being a hard reality, the U.S. is continuing its presence in south Korea, asserting its rule over the divided Korean nation.
					
					 The U.S. ignited the Korean war and committed all sorts of crimes. The war was suspended by the conclusion of the Armistice Agreement but the Korean nation is still undergoing the pain resulting from the division due to outside forces.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korea kicked off joint military drills simulating the use of nukes on Mar. 2 this year and are staging even landing rehearsals.
					
					 They are not the ones for "defense" but are aimed to serve the U.S. purpose of holding hegemony in Northeast Asia.
					
					  Such vicious, self-righteous and dangerous military drills should be stopped at once.
					
					  The statement strongly urged the south Korean authorities to respond to the DPRK's call for dialogue to defuse the confrontation between the north and the south and achieve the independent reunification.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Tajik Political Figure
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Tajik Political Figure
 Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- Sh. Shabdolov, chairman of the Communist Party of Tajikistan, issued a statement on March 20 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 He said that the President was the brilliant iron-willed commander who achieved the liberation of the Korean nation and successfully defended the dignity and sovereignty of the country from the imperialists' invasion. He went on:
					
					 The President only believed in the popular masses and waged a protracted anti-Japanese armed struggle, finally defeating the Japanese imperialists and achieving the country's liberation.
					
					 He also wisely led the army and people of the DPRK in the hard-fought Fatherland Liberation War against the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces, thus honorably defending the dignity and sovereignty of the country.
					
					 The Korean people have always won victories in the political and military confrontation with the U.S. imperialists since the ceasefire.
					
					 The DPRK will demonstrate its dignity forever as it is wisely led by HE Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, and it has the army and people boundlessly loyal to him.

articles.title: British Paper Praises Feats Performed by Kim Il Sung for DPRK-Russia Friendship
articles.content:
British Paper Praises Feats Performed by Kim Il Sung for DPRK-Russia Friendship 
 Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- The organ of the New Communist Party of Britain The New Worker on Mar. 13 carried an article "Unforgettable days in history of DPRK-Russia friendship" illustrated with photos documenting external activities of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 It introduced in detail about the fact that the President paid an official goodwill visit to the former Soviet Union in 1949, paving the way for developing the DPRK-Russia relations of friendship and cooperation. 
					
					 The article went on:
					
					 Since his Russia visit the friendship between the DPRK and Russia and their cooperative relations in economy, cultural and other fields have steadily developed under the special care of the top leaders of the two countries. 
					
					 He paid several visits to the former Soviet Union, developing the friendly relations between the two countries at a new higher stage, and provided a solid foundation and good tradition of the DPRK-Russia friendship. 
					
					 The tradition has steadily developed over the past decades. 
					
					 The exploits he performed during his external activities will always go down in the history of the DPRK-Russia friendship.

articles.title: Swiss Bodies Denounce S. Korean Authorities' Moves for Escalating Confrontation of Social Systems
articles.content:
Swiss Bodies Denounce S. Korean Authorities' Moves for Escalating Confrontation of Social Systems
 Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea on Mar. 15 made public a joint statement in support of the statement of a spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea. 
					 It recalled that a spokesman for the CPRK issued a statement as regards the recently disclosed fact that the puppet Preparatory Committee for Unification of south Korea is a plot-breeding body for studying and preparing for "unification through absorption". 
					
					 The south Korean authorities are getting frantic with the moves for "unification through absorption" and confrontation of social systems as running dogs of the U.S. imperialists, zealously pursuant to their hostile policy towards the DPRK, the joint statement said, adding: 
					
					 However, such moves do not work on the DPRK. 
					
					 The three charters for national reunification formulated by leader Kim Jong Il are the most fair and aboveboard programme for the reunification of Korea as they indicates clear ways for achieving the  independent and peaceful reunification of Korea. 
					
					 "German style unification" touted by Park Geun Hye can never be tolerated by the Korean nation and it will only escalate the confrontation between Koreans in the north and the south. 
					
					 Park Geun Hye should immediately disband the traitorous and reactionary "Preparatory Committee for Unification". 
					
					 If Park persists in her moves for escalating the confrontation of social systems, she will never escape the denunciation by all Koreans and the DPRK will not deal with the present authorities of south Korea.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Lauded by Foreign Figures
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Lauded by Foreign Figures
 Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- Seminars and film shows took place in India, Spain and Venezuela from March 20 to 24 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Films shown included a Korean film "Fireworks of a Thriving Nation".
					
					 The chairman of the Indian Society for Juche Idea-Self-Reliance Studies lauded the President for making undying contributions to the cause of achieving the freedom and liberation of the country.
					
					 Recalling that he led the anti-Japanese armed struggle without any state rear backing or assistance from a regular army, the chairman stressed that the exploits he performed by liberating the country would always go down in history.
					
					 The general secretary and members of the leadership of the Democratic Workers' Party of Spain praised Kim Il Sung for crushing the two formidable enemies, U.S. and Japanese imperialists, in one generation and turning the DPRK into a socialist power, independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence.
					
					 The chairman of the Venezuela-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Association praised Kim Il Sung for not only founding the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK and leading them to victory but also making great contributions to the cause of global independence.
					
					 The chairman of the Venezuelan National Society for the Study of the Juche Idea stressed that the Juche idea founded by Kim Il Sung is a beacon indicating the way to be followed by humankind.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Slovakia
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Slovakia
 Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- A Slovak preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was inaugurated in Bratislava on March 23.
					 Ivan Draxler, chairman of the Slovak Association for Supporting the Juche Idea, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize various political and cultural events to praise the noble revolutionary careers of the President and leader Kim Jong Il and undying feats of Marshal Kim Jong Un on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Vocero del MINREX rechaza la "resolucion de DDHH" anti-RPDC
articles.content:
Vocero del MINREX rechaza la "resolucion de DDHH" anti-RPDC
Pyongyang, 28 de marzo (ACNC) -- En relacion con que EE.UU. y sus seguidores como Japon y la Union Europea aprobaron otra vez de modo coercitivo en la 28a reunion del Consejo de Derechos Humanos de la ONU la llamada "resolucion de DDHH" anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el vocero del MINREX de la RPDC hizo publica el dia 28 una declaracion que sigue:
					El dia 27, en la 28a reunion del Consejo de Derechos Humanos de la ONU, EE.UU. y sus satelites como Japon y la UE aprobaron otra vez la llamada "resolucion de DDHH" anti-RPDC, fabricadas por ellos mismos, movilizando las herramientas de votacion, a pesar del rechazo de los paises progresistas del mundo que aspiran a los derechos humanos autenticos y el establecimiento del imparcial orden internacional.
					
					Denunciando y rechazando categoricamente ese acto hostil como producto de la politica hostil de EE.UU. a la RPDC, exponemos una vez mas claramente la firme voluntad de la RPDC de frustrar tajantemente la febril campana de "DDHH" de las fuerzas hostiles.
					
					Mediante la "aprobacion de esa resolucion", EE.UU. y otras fuerzas hostiles expusieron su malsana intencion de manchar la dignidad y la imagen de la RPDC y preparar el pretexto de intervencion y agresion contra ella al cuestionar obstinadamente el absurdo "problema de DDHH".
					
					Ya se ha conocido de sobra en el mundo que es fraudulento el "problema de DDHH" de la RPDC que fue fabricado por los lacayos de EE.UU., disfrazados de "defensa de DDHH", a base de los "testimonios" de los "fugitivos norcoreanos", carentes de la conciencia elemental del hombre, y propagado ampliamente por EE.UU. y el Occidente.
					
					Sin embargo, EE.UU y las fuerzas seguidoras volvieron a orquestar la farsa de aprobacion de la "resolucion de DDHH" repitiendo su "insistencia" ya desmentida. Esto persigue un malsano objetivo de salir de su situacion miserable y evadir las criticas internacionales enfocadas en sus actos violadores de DDHH, al recrudecer la campana de DDHH contra la RPDC.
					
					Es absurdo cuestionar el estado de derechos humanos de otro pais sin corregir la brutal violacion de DDHH en casa ni reconocer sus atentados contra los DDHH.
					
					En vez de intervenir en asuntos internos de otros paises portandose como "juez de derechos humanos", EE.UU. debe reparar primero el estado de DDHH en territorio propio, condenado como tierra privada de DDHH de este mundo. A su vez, Japon y la UE deberan mejorar su imagen manchada ante la sociedad internacional, en lugar de actuar atrevidamente siguiendo a EE.UU. 
					
					EE.UU. y las fuerzas hostiles deben conocer claramente que es irrealizable su intento de derrumbar el regimen socialista mas ventajoso de nuestro pais, considerado como vida por nuestro ejercito y pueblo.

articles.title: Comite Coreano de Ayuda a los Compatriotas en Ultramar condena represion anti-Chongryon en Japon
articles.content:
Comite Coreano de Ayuda a los Compatriotas en Ultramar condena represion anti-Chongryon en Japon
Pyongyang, 28 de marzo (ACNC) -- El dia 26, las autoridades policiales japonesas registraron forzada y sorpresivamente los domicilios del presidente y el vicepresidente del Presidium del Comite Central de la Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon (Chongryon) y otos funcionarios de la misma organizacion.
					En esta operacion fue movilizada la jefatura de investigacion conjunta de los cuarteles generales policiacos de la prefectura de Kyoto y los departamentos de Kanagawa, Yamaguchi y Shimane
					
					En particular, la casa del presidente estuvo bloqueada por mas de 20 policias y hasta el carro blindado y rodeada por los periodistas de medios japoneses que fueron citados para cubrir el registro.
					
					El Comite Coreano de Ayuda a los Compatriotas en Ultramar publico el dia 27 una declaracion condenando esa operacion represiva contra la Chongryon que cometieron los reaccionarios japoneses.
					
					El registro forzado es pesquisa ilegal que viola la Constitucion y la ley de procedimiento penal de Japon.
					
					Igualmente, constituye un imperdonable acto de violacion de DDHH y discriminacion nacional contra los coreanos residentes en Japon, adelanta la nota y continua:
					
					Hasta los juristas y los medios de conciencia de Japon fustigan el caracter injusto del registro forzado mostrandose escepticos de su justificacion legal y objetivo politico.
					
					La Chongryon es digna entidad de ciudadanos de la RPDC en ultramar y el atentado contra ella y los coreanos en Japon es precisamente la violacion de la soberania de la RPDC.
					
					Esta clara la intencion politica de las autoridades japonesas que cometieron ese acto fascista movilizando las fuerzas policiales.
					
					Se trata de una artimana politica para silenciar la opinion publica progresista, que exige la disculpa e indemnizacion de la historia de colonialismo japones, y justificar la politica de derechizacion al infundir en la sociedad japonesa el resentimiento contra la RPDC, la Chongryon y los coreanos.
					
					Tambien es un producto de la conspiracion politica para prolongar, por todos los medios, las medidas de "sancion" independiente sobre la RPDC y poner obstaculos artificiales a la corriente de la epoca hacia el mejoramiento de las relaciones Corea-Japon.
					
					Las autoridades japonesas deben pedir disculpas a la Chongryon y la RPDC por el registro forzado y actuar con prudencia conociendo que el hostigamiento y la represion contra la Chongryon son actos de autodestruccion que llevan a la fase irremediable las relaciones Corea-Japon.

articles.title: CRPP condena categoricamente la escalada de campana anti-RPDC
articles.content:
CRPP condena categoricamente la escalada de campana anti-RPDC
Pyongyang, 28 de marzo (ACNC) -- En relacion con que la banda titere surcoreana recrudece la campana intrigante y la farsa contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea con motivo del 5o aniversario del incidente de hundimiento de la corbeta "Cheonan", el Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) publico el dia 27 la informacion No. 1087.
					Durante la "ceremonia de recordacion", el "acto de juramento de seguridad", la "exhibicion especial de fotos sobre la seguridad" y otros actos organizados en estos dias, los titeres surcoreanos atribuyeron el "hundimiento de ´Cheonan´ al ataque de un submarino norcoreano" reclamando la "disculpa" y la "represalia".
					
					Por otra parte, los belicistas del circulo militar surcoreano intensifican con EE.UU. los ejercicios de guerra Foal Eagle contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					Como parte de ellos, llevaron a cabo el entrenamiento de traslado naval y el tiro de combate de artilleria fomentando la fiebre de guerra.
					
					El problema esta en que hasta la mandataria surcoreana se suma a la farsa anti-RPDC pronunciando palabras conflictivas.
					
					En su "discurso pronunciado en la ceremonia de recordacion", efectuada en "Hyonchungwon" de Taejon, ella menciono el supuesto "ataque sorpresivo de torpedo del Norte".
					
					Critico obstinadamente a la RPDC usando expresiones como "aislamiento" y "cambio verdadero" y diciendo que "el Norte debe dejarse de imprudentes actos provocadores" y "abandonar la idea de que puede defenderse con el arma nuclear".
					
					Por otra parte, el dia 27, el representante del "Partido Saenuri", Kim Mu Song, se atrevio a calumniar la maxima dignidad de la RPDC.
					
					La informacion del Secretariado del CRPP senalo que lo susodicho es otra intolerable provocacion contra la RPDC e infame acto conflictivo que lleva a la situacion catastrofica las relaciones intercoreanas, y continuo:
					
					Hoy en dia, ninguna persona con sano juicio hace caso de la propaganda de que la corbeta "Cheonan" fue "hundida por el Norte".
					
					Si EE.UU. y la banda titere surcoreana continuan difundiendo esa mentira, seran mas ridiculizados en la arena internacional.
					
					Ultimamente, los titeres surcoreanos visitan hasta las tumbas de jovenes y adultos del ejercito surcoreano, que murieron como victimas de la campana belica anti-RPDC de EE.UU., para dar consuelos y otros actos hipocritas y para acusar a la RPDC que no tiene nada que ver con el incidente arriba mencionado.
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos, criminales y asesinos que hundieron la corbeta "Cheonan", se esfuerzan por ocultar su naturaleza vinculando injustamente el incidente con la RPDC.
					
					No se puede ocultar nunca la verdad y los autores del incidente seran condenados duro por la historia y la nacion.
					
					La mandataria y otros conservadores surcoreanos deben pedir disculpas a toda la nacion por haber acusado a la RPDC y parar inmediatamente su campana provocativa.
					
					Ellos deberan actuar con juicio reflexionando de las consecuencias catastroficas de sus actos frivolos.

articles.title: Delegacion de UMDC parte con rumbo a El Salvador y Mexico
articles.content:
Delegacion de UMDC parte con rumbo a El Salvador y Mexico
Pyongyang, 28 de marzo (ACNC) -- Salio el dia 28 de esta capital la delegacion de la Union de Mujeres Democraticas de Corea encabezada por la vicepresidenta de su Comite Central, Chae Chun Hui, para participar en las reuniones de la Federacion Democratica Internacional de Mujeres a sesionar en El Salvador y para realizar una visita a Mexico.
